title: In furtherance of above the D
clause_text: In furtherance of above the D.C.F. shall give his detailed remarks regarding tree/s proposed to be cut and / or transplanted if any. However, the number of trees proposed to be cut or transplant shall not exceed 10 % of the number of trees existing thereupon.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
